headline: BlackRock Mid-Cap Growth Equity Fund Q4 2024 Commentary
summary: BlackRock Mid-Cap Growth Equity Fund posted returns of 4.46% (Institutional shares) and 4.42% (Investor A shares, without sales charge) for the fourth quarter of 2024.
